name: Samsung Galaxy s22 Ultra
detail: 5G Connectivity (SA / NSA): More spectrum bands supported by a handset would provide wider 5G connectivity across markets. Enhanced Coverage: Handset features that can increase the time spent on 5G technology. Super fast 4G: Features that enhance speeds even in 4G coverage.

name: Xiaomi Redmi 12 Pro
detail: Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Pro price starts from BDT. 28,990. Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Pro internal storage base variant of 6 GB, 8 GB, 12 GB Ram, 128 GB, 256 GB Internal Memory (ROM). Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Pro which is available in Black, Blue, White, Violet colour.

name: One Plus 10 Pro
detail: OnePlus 10 Pro is yet another premium flagship offering from the brand. The smartphone promises seamless visuals and detailed portraits. It continues the OnePlus legacy with a powerful processor configuration backed by a massive 8GB RAM. Moreover, a 5000mAh battery with 80W Super VOOC Charging capability ensures prolonged usage.

name: iPhone 14
detail: Apple iPhone 14 features a 12MP camera sensor which can record endless videos in a seamless manner. The brand has incorporated iOS v16 along with flagship features like Dust-proof and Water resistance. As always, buyers get their hands on a robust processor configuration and a massive storage unit which assures lag-free working experience.

name: Macbook Air M2

name: iPad Pro 2021
detail: Apple iPad Pro 11-inch (2021) Wi-Fi + Cellular tablet was launched on 20th April 2021. The tablet comes with a 11.00-inch touchscreen display offering a resolution of 2388x1668 pixels at a pixel density of 264 pixels per inch (ppi). Apple iPad Pro 11-inch (2021) Wi-Fi + Cellular is powered by an octa-core Apple M1 processor. It comes with 16GB of RAM.

name: Samsung Galaxy S7
detail: Meet the most advanced Samsung Galaxy Tab S7/S7+/S7 FE. The Galaxy tab will change the way you work and play with its ultra-smooth 120Hz display. The intelligent display adjusts the refresh rate, according to the content and helps you save the battery. Experience the cinematic view with Quad Speaker sound by AKG and Dolby Atoms. It cares for your eyes so that you can binge-watch all your favorite shows with its lowest blue light display.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 7
detail: The Microsoft Surface Pro 7 is the latest in a long line of 2-in-1 tablets, and not much has changed in terms of design since the original. You get a large 12.3-inch 3:2 screen that works well in landscape or portrait and supports stylus as well as multi-touch input. The trademark kickstand allows for a wide range of positions. The Surface Pro 7 is expensive and you'll most probably need to spend more for a Type Cover keyboard attachment.

name: Xiaomi Mi Pad 5
detail: The Xiaomi Mi Pad 5 is a quality mid-range tablet with a focus on performance. It is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 860 SoC which offers good gaming performance and comes with a 120Hz display which makes the software experience feel quite fluid. The large display also supports Dolby Vision for a better viewing experience, while the quad-speaker system offers loud and clear audio which comes in use when consuming content and gaming.

name: Apple Watch 7
detail: Always-on Retina display has nearly 20% more screen area than Series 6, making everything easier to see and use;The most crack-resistant front crystal yet on an Apple Watch, IP6X dust resistance and swimproof design

name: Xiaomi Mi Band 7
detail: This is an Upcoming Fitness Band. Xiaomi Mi Band 7 is expected to launch soon.

name: OnePlus Watch Midnight Black
detail: 3D model based on the original dimensions of a real OnePlus smartwatch.All main parts of the model are separated objects. Therefore, you can easily change all materials. We provide several formats for each model, most of them are available by default.All colors can be easily modified.

name: realme Smart Watch 2 Pro
detail: HD Super Bright Touchscreen Display for fine picture quality and vivid colors Heart Rate & Blood Oxygen Saturation (SpO2) Monitors Dual Satellite Low Power GPS supporting GLONASS and GPS provides accurate & independent path tracking for running, jogging, cycling, walking. Up to 14 Days Battery Life 90 Sport Modes - Outdoor Run, Indoor Run, Outdoor Walk, Indoor Walk, Outdoor Cycling, Spinning, Hiking, Basketball, Yoga, Rowing, Elliptical, Cricket etc.
